options.command: sbt '; set javaOptions += "-agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=5005" ; set fork := true ; set javaOptions += "-Dconfig.resource=application-fusion-node-rest-v1.dev.conf" ; runMain io.agamis.fusion.Main'

sbt '; set javaOptions += "-agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=5015" ; set fork := true ; set javaOptions += "-Dconfig.resource=application-fusion-node-data.dev.conf" ; runMain io.agamis.fusion.Main'
